column2: Why’re those yahoos in Nibelheim still refusing to join the Federation?
Once you join, you just put on a good show, raise your civic rank, and you’re set for life.
The people of Nibelheim really helped us out a lot when we were putting the town back together.
We’d never have finished up so quickly if they hadn’t been kind enough to pitch in.
I guess I was the real yahoo for ever having looked down my nose at ’em.
